title: Primitive Man
medium: Various charcoals, with touches of black chalk, stumping, wiping and erasing, heightened with touches of white and ocher gouache, on cream wove paper altered to a pale, golden tone
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Through prior bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Martin A. Ryerson

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of various charcoals, with touches of black chalk, stumping, wiping and erasing, heightened with touches of white and ocher gouache, on cream wove paper altered to a pale, golden tone.
